# thunder_system_jumbo_global (Resource)

`thunder_system_jumbo_global`: To enable/disable jumbo

__PLACEHOLDER__

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "thunder" {
  address  = var.dut9049
  username = var.username
  password = var.password
}
resource "thunder_system_jumbo_global" "thunder_system_jumbo_global" {
  enable_jumbo = 0
}
```
